intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to know the operational status of all lights in the home, specifically whether each light is currently on or off.  
Constraints & cues: The user is inquiring about three meross light strips located in the main area, with two currently on and one off.  
Risk assessment: There is a risk of miscommunication if the user has additional lights not mentioned or if they expect specific details about brightness or color settings, which were not requested.
environment_overview:
